data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: A young, determined Vela Wayfinder Initiate, a human warrior with lean strength, stands vigilantly on the forward deck of a sleek outrigger starship, intently studying a glowing, holographic star-chart held in one hand. Their Polynesian-inspired attire is adorned with nascent, subtly glowing *Tatau* markings, reflecting their hopeful spirit as they navigate through a cosmic sea alive with vibrant coral nebulae and distant, floating island-worlds under a deep twilight sky.
Artist Credit: inspired by Kekai Kotaki

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
